Isaiah or Isaias__28.1__Ephraim: : That is, the kingdom of the ten tribes.-- Ibid.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.1__The head of the fat valley: : Samaria, situate on a hill, having under it a most fertile valley.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.10__Command, command again: : This is said in the person of the Jews, resisting the repeated commands of God, and still putting him off.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.16__Let him not hasten: : Let him expect his coming with patience.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.20__The bed is straitened: : It is too narrow to hold two: God will have the bed of our heart all to himself.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.21__As in the mountain: : As the Lord fought against the Philistines in Baal Pharasim, 2 Kings 5., and against the Chanaanites, in the valley of Gabaon, Jos. 10.
Isaiah or Isaias__28.29__This also: : Such also is the proceeding of the Lord with his land, and the divers seeds he throws therein.
